predicate.note: Frames file for 'trip' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: passive
example.text: A circuit breaker that [*T*-1] would have closed down the New York Stock Exchange was n't tripped [*-2] .
example.arg: [*-2] -> A circuit breaker that [*T*-1] would have closed down the New York Stock Exchange
